sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-form label-width="120px">
    <el-form-item label="语言选择">
      <el-select placeholder="请选择语言">
        <el-option label="zh_CN" value="zh_CN"/>
        <el-option label="en_US" value="en_US"/>
      </el-select>
      <el-button @click="SetLocale('zh_CN')">zh_CN</el-button>
      <el-button/>
    </el-form-item>
  </el-form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "ChangeLocale",
  methods: {
    SetLocale(locale) {
      console.log(locale);
      this.$i18n.global.locale.value = locale;
    },
  },
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
